name: Sudoku Search Mania HD Free - The Full Classic Puzzle Quest Searching Party Pack for iPad
name_original: Sudoku Search Mania HD Free - The Full Classic Puzzle Quest Searching Party Pack for iPad
description:
!!! Sudoku game is now better than ever !!!

Great sudoku with a beatiful graphics and rich features. This is easy sudoku puzzle game to start with. This great sudoku game work with your iPhone/iPad devices. Game highlight selected numbers, so it's easier to found all the numbers. You can also make notes, that help you to solve current puzzle. Great statistic system keep track on played games, times and some other details...

[ FEATURES ]

+ Easy and fun gameplay
+ Unlimited number of puzzles
+ Scoring system
+ Game center hi-scores
+ Great game statistics
+ Numbers highlighted (easier to see)
+ Make a notes (small numbers on empty cells)
+ Smart notes (automaticly remove notes when they are no longer valid)
+ Error checking prevents wrong moves (easy/normal mode)
+ Hard mode allows all the mistakes, like when you solving paper sudoku
+ Fun for days and all age

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other awesome games, so type "Codecube brothers" to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)
